categories: Category:The Official Black Spire Outpost Cookbook recipes

nodes.text: Wroshyr Tree Cake was a type of brown cake that could be consumed by Artiodacs and Wookiees. It was created by the chef Strono Tuggs on the planet Takodana, while he was working at Maz Kanata's castle. The cake was themed off of wroshyr trees from the Wookiee homeworld, Kashyyyk. After the Battle of Takodana in 34 ABY, Tuggs began to serve Wroshyr Tree Cake in his traveling restaurant, Tuggs' Grub, while stationed in Docking Bay 7 Food and Cargo on the Outer Rim planet Batuu.
Wroshyr Tree Cake was first mentioned in the 2019 recipe book Star Wars: Galaxy's Edge: The Official Black Spire Outpost Cookbook, which was authored by Chelsea Monroe-Cassel and Marc Sumerak.
